api_list.name: properties/get-featured-reviews
api_list.description: Get featured reviews of stayed guests

vpm_featured_reviews.cons: The staff entered in our room the morning (around 8:30/9 a.m.) and make some noise so they woke us up. Except that, it was the best "cheap hostel" that we had in Hanoi and I won't hesitate to book it again.
vpm_featured_reviews.pros: REALLY nice staff, the room was really clean, the bathroom was clean and a good breakfast. Very good location as well.

vpm_featured_reviews.cons: Nothing .All perfect for the price I paid
vpm_featured_reviews.title: Amazing
vpm_featured_reviews.pros: This hostel is amazing . The location is so great with a nice price. Room are so clean staff is amazing too. I ordered a mix room by mistook then she helps me changed to female room. Love there . I will go back again if I will travel to ha noi next time
Such good value! Really clean and great location. Highly recommend
I would say value for money, courteous staff, need and tidy room and bunks.
vpm_featured_reviews.title: Ga Hostel is priceless.
vpm_featured_reviews.cons: The stairs are narrow but can't expect much for the value one pay for. If there was a roof top for hang out it would be wonderful.

vpm_featured_reviews.pros: The staff were very friendly and helpful with everything. Furthermore the location was perfect for exploring Hanoi.
vpm_featured_reviews.cons: The breakfast was a bit simple and not that filling
Nothing. Here is very perfect place. Don't worry. All staffs will help you to enjoy travel.
vpm_featured_reviews.title: GA hostel is perfect place.
vpm_featured_reviews.pros: Gahostel is the perfect place to travel. All staffs is very kind and the atmosphere is good to meet new friends. I did 3 cooing classes because I wanted to learn about local food. Finally in Gahostel, I got 1500 pictures. The number means a lot of things.
The staff was great, free healthy breakfast, comfy bed. Privacy in shower area/big shower stalls. Central in Old Quarter, so really close to many attractions.
The staff is very friendly and caring. They offer a free yoga lesson in the hostel which was really nice.
Very good rooms ,clean ,nice stuff for shore we will comeback ,perfect price
vpm_featured_reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

vpm_featured_reviews.pros:
Friendly staff! Booked my amazing Sapa trip and Halong Bay tour throw the hostel! Good breakfast and anytime you need something, Lucia and her 
amazing staff are there to help you! Will absolutely come again to GA Hostel !!!!!

parameters.description: The check-out date, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-08-15

parameters.description: The number of rooms

parameters.description: The number of adults

parameters.name: arrival_date
parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-08-14
